pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Package for BInary Longitudinal Data // Performs logistic regression for binary longitudinal data, allowing for serial dependence among observations from a given individual and a random intercept term. Estimation is via maximization of the exact likelihood of a suitably defined model. Missing values and unbalanced data are allowed, with some restrictions. M. Helena Goncalves et al.(2007) DOI: 10.18637/jss.v046.i09.
